FullText:
Fire Nymph

This creature appears as a very attractive and beautiful female with long, flowing fiery-red hair. Her eyes are pale blue and her skin is lightly colored with a cinnamon hint to it.



Fire Nymph

CR 4

XP 1,200
CN Medium outsider (extraplanar, fire)
Init +1; Senses darkvision 60 ft.; Perception +8
DEFENSE
AC 15, touch 12, flat-footed 13 (+1 Dex, +1 dodge, +3 natural)
hp 13 (2d10+2)
Fort +1, Ref +4, Will +6
Immune fire; SR 10
Weaknesses vulnerability to fire
OFFENSE
Spd 30 ft.
Melee masterwork dagger +3 (1d4/19-20 plus burn), slam +2 (1d4)
Ranged masterwork dagger +4 (1d4/19-20 plus burn)
Space 5 ft.; Reach 5 ft.
Special Attacks burn (1d4, DC 12)
Spell-Like Abilities (CL 7th)
At will— burning hands (DC 15), flame blade, flaming sphere (DC 16), produce flame
1/day— fire shield
STATISTICS
Str 10, Dex 13, Con 12, Int 16, Wis 17, Cha 19
Base Atk +2; CMB +2; CMD 14
Feats Dodge
Skills Bluff +9, Diplomacy +9, Escape Artist +6, Knowledge (nature) +8, Knowledge (planes) +8, Perception +8, Sense Motive +8, Stealth +6, Survival +8
Languages Common, Ignan
Combat Gear masterwork dagger
ECOLOGY
Environment Plane of Fire
Organization solitary
Treasure standard


A fire nymph is a very beautiful creature that dwells on the Plane of Fire. It is akin to the nymph and dryad, though its origins obviously lie elsewhere. Fire nymphs rarely visit the Material Plane, though mages are known to request their company on occasion. A fire nymph usually wears translucent robes of white or ash.

Fire nymphs avoid combat if at all possible, but if pressed into action they rely on their spell-like abilities and seek escape as soon as possible.

Copyright Notice Author Scott Greene.

Name: Fire Nymph
Skills: Bluff +9, Diplomacy +9, Escape Artist +6, Knowledge (nature) +8, Knowledge (planes) +8, Perception +8, Sense Motive +8, Stealth +6, Survival +8
